title: Patchouli (Traditional) - Choose Size Zusa Brand Fragrance Perfume Aromatherapy in 10mL (1/3oz) OR 30mL (1oz) Roll-On Bottle, 2oz or 4oz
description: Patchouli (Traditional) - Choose Size Zusa Brand Fragrance Perfume Aromatherapy in 10mL (1/3oz) OR 30mL (1oz) Roll-On Bottle, 2oz or 4oz
cleaned_text: Description Our oils are presented in the useful and classic roll-on bottle are of the traditional body essence type, with no alcohols. ................. I have high standards and I've sold thousands of oils and are hypo-allergenic. We strive to use the best and the freshest fragrances and ingredients- Jojoba and almond oil, organic essential oils, and Vitamin E. Sizes over 30ml may be prepared in separate 1oz bottles, as many oils can be too thick for droppers, but send a message with your order if you are still interested in receiving 2 or 4oz droppers.
